column4: hi i have a little problem i cannot see other computers in network
they were there before now they are gone
help my network does not show any computers
yeah i did one thing i shared a folder
are you talking about windows computers on your network?
can you still see them by going to "Windows Network" (meaning are they only gone from the first "Network" screen, or are they gone all together?
i am using ubuntu and when i go to network now i cant see other computers on my network but i can still acces them if i type smb://IP_ADDRESS

normall when you goto network you have an option called "Windows Network" as well as showing other computer directly, can you still access the windows computer by browsing through that or does that not show up?
nothing at all?? ... hmmm I was wondering if your workgroup was changed when you started sharing, which is possioble but probably wouldn't cause that
i double click it but nothing is inside
I would double check that your Domain Workgroup (the second tab of Shared Folders) is set to the same thing as the windows computers
unfortunately no, don't know enough about samba, and unfortunately havn't had that problem
